questions.text: A developer needs to set up an SSL security certificate for a client's eCommerce website in order to use the HTTPS protocol. Which of the following AWS services can be used to deploy the required SSL server certificates? (Choose TWO)
questions.explanation: Correct answer: A, B. It supports DNS and SSL management for custom domains. It lets you easily provision and manage SSL/TLS certificates.

questions.text: Which of the following AWS services scale automatically without your intervention? (Choose TWO)
questions.explanation: Correct answer: B, C. It scales storage automatically to handle growing data. It automatically scales compute capacity based on usage.

questions.text: A company is planning to migrate an application from Amazon EC2 to AWS Lambda to use a serverless architecture. Which of the following will be the responsibility of AWS after migration? (Choose TWO)
questions.explanation: Correct answer: B, D. AWS automatically manages compute resources in Lambda. AWS manages the OS layer in managed databases.

questions.text: How do ELBs improve the reliability of your application?

options.text: A. By distributing traffic across multiple S3 buckets.
B. By replicating data to multiple availability zones.
C. By creating database Read Replicas.
D. By ensuring that only healthy targets receive traffic.

questions.explanation: Correct answer: D. ELBs route traffic only to healthy instances to improve reliability.

questions.text: A company needs to migrate their website from on-premises to AWS. Security is a major concern for them, so they need to host their website on hardware that is NOT shared with other AWS customers. Which of the following EC2 instance options meets this requirement?
questions.explanation: Correct answer: C. They run on hardware dedicated to a single customer for isolation.

questions.text: A customer is planning to move billions of images and videos to be stored on Amazon S3. The customer has approximately 60 Petabytes of data to move. Which of the following AWS Services is the best choice to transfer the data to AWS?
questions.explanation: Correct answer: C. Snowmobile is designed to transfer exabytes of data securely.

questions.text: A company plans to migrate a large amount of archived data to AWS. The archived data must be maintained for a period of 5 years and must be retrievable within 5 hours of a request. What is the most cost-effective AWS storage service to use?
questions.explanation: Correct answer: A. It's a low-cost archival storage service with retrieval in hours.

questions.text: Which AWS Service is used to manage user permissions?
questions.explanation: Correct answer: C. IAM is used to manage user access and permissions to AWS resources.

questions.text: Which support plan includes AWS Support Concierge Service?
questions.explanation: Correct answer: C. Enterprise Support includes Concierge for billing and account assistance.

questions.text: A company needs to track resource changes using the API call history. Which AWS service can help the company achieve this goal?
questions.explanation: Correct answer: C. CloudTrail logs API calls and actions for auditing and security.

questions.text: What are the benefits of using an AWS-managed service? (Choose TWO)

options.text: A. Provides complete control over the virtual infrastructure.
B. Allows customers to deliver new solutions faster.
D. Eliminates the need to encrypt data.
E. Allows developers to control all patching related activities.

questions.explanation: Correct answer: B, C. Managed services reduce setup overhead so teams can innovate faster. They offload tasks like patching, scaling, and backups.

questions.text: Which of the following are use cases for Amazon S3? (Choose TWO)

options.text: B. Hosting websites that require sustained high CPU utilization.
C. Cost-effective database and log storage.
D. A media store for the CloudFront service.
E. Processing data streams at any scale.

questions.explanation: Correct answer: A, D. S3 can serve static content with web hosting configuration. S3 integrates seamlessly with CloudFront for content delivery.

questions.text: What is the AWS’ recommendation regarding access keys?

options.text: A. Delete all access keys and use passwords instead.
B. Only share them with trusted people.
D. Save them within your application code.

questions.explanation: Correct answer: C. Rotating access keys reduces the risk of compromise.

questions.text: What is the AWS IAM feature that provides an additional layer of security on top of user-name and password authentication?
questions.explanation: Correct answer: D. Multi-Factor Authentication adds a second layer of protection.

questions.text: What is the benefit of using an API to access AWS Services?

options.text: A. It improves the performance of AWS resources.
B. It reduces the time needed to provision AWS resources.
C. It reduces the number of developers necessary.
D. It allows for programmatic management of AWS resources.

questions.explanation: Correct answer: D. APIs allow automation and scripting of cloud operations.

questions.text: A company is planning to migrate a database with high read/write activity to AWS. What is the best storage option to use?
questions.explanation: Correct answer: C. EBS provides high-performance block storage for databases.

questions.text: How can AWS customers track and avoid over-spending on underutilized reserved instances?

options.text: A. Customers can add all AWS accounts to an AWS Organization, enable Consolidated Billing, and turn off Reserved Instance sharing.
B. Customers can use Amazon Neptune to track and analyze their usage patterns, detect underutilized reserved instances, and then sell them on the Amazon EC2 Reserved Instance Marketplace.
C. Customers can use the AWS Budgets service to track the reserved instances usage and set up alert notifications when their utilization drops below the threshold that they define.
D. Customers can use Amazon CloudTrail to automatically check for unused reservations and get recommendations to reduce their bill.

questions.explanation: Correct answer: C.

questions.text: What is the AWS service that provides five times the performance of a standard MySQL database?
questions.explanation: Correct answer: A. Aurora is a MySQL-compatible service with up to 5x performance.

questions.text: What does AWS Service Catalog provide?

options.text: A. It enables customers to quickly find descriptions and use cases for AWS services.
B. It enables customers to explore the different catalogs of AWS services.
C. It simplifies organizing and governing commonly deployed IT services.
D. It allows developers to deploy infrastructure on AWS using familiar programming languages.

questions.explanation: Correct answer: C. Service Catalog helps maintain consistency and control.

questions.text: For managed services like Amazon DynamoDB, which of the below is AWS responsible for? (Choose TWO)
questions.explanation: Correct answer: C, D. AWS handles updates in managed services. AWS manages the OS layer in managed databases.

questions.text: Which of the following AWS Services helps with planning application migration to the AWS Cloud?
questions.explanation: Correct answer: B. It collects configuration and usage data for planning migrations.

questions.text: A company is trying to analyze the costs applied to their AWS account recently. Which of the following provides them the most granular data about their AWS costs and usage?
questions.explanation: Correct answer: C. It provides the most detailed billing and usage data.

questions.text: Which statement best describes the concept of an AWS region?

options.text: A. An AWS Region is a geographical location with a collection of Edge locations.
B. An AWS Region is a virtual network dedicated only to a single AWS customer.
C. An AWS Region is a geographical location with a collection of Availability Zones.
D. An AWS Region represents the country where the AWS infrastructure exist.

questions.explanation: Correct answer: C. Each region contains multiple isolated data centers.

questions.text: A company has discovered that multiple S3 buckets were deleted, but it is unclear who deleted the buckets. Which of the following can the company use to determine the identity that deleted the buckets?
questions.explanation: Correct answer: D. CloudTrail records all S3 bucket actions with identity details.

questions.text: Which of the following are factors in determining the appropriate database technology to use for a specific workload? (Choose TWO)

options.text: C. The number of reads and writes per second.
D. The nature of the queries.

questions.explanation: Correct answer: C, D. It helps determine the performance needs of the database. Different engines are optimized for different query patterns.

questions.text: What are the benefits of implementing a tagging strategy for AWS resources? (Choose TWO)

options.text: A. Quickly identify resources that belong to a specific project.
B. Quickly identify software solutions on AWS.
C. Track API calls in your AWS account.
D. Quickly identify deleted resources and their metadata.
E. Track AWS spending across multiple resources.

questions.explanation: Correct answer: A, E. Tags group related resources for easier management. Tags help break down costs in billing reports.

questions.text: What are AWS shared controls?

options.text: A. Controls that are solely the responsibility of the customer based on the application they are deploying within AWS services.
B. Controls that a customer inherits from AWS.
C. Controls that apply to both the infrastructure layer and customer layers.
D. Controls that the customer and AWS collaborate together upon to secure the infrastructure.

questions.explanation: Correct answer: D. Shared controls involve responsibilities on both sides.

questions.text: Which design principles relate to performance efficiency in AWS? (Choose TWO)

options.text: A. Build multi-region architectures to better serve global customers.
B. Apply security at all layers.
C. Implement strong Identity and Access controls.

questions.explanation: Correct answer: A, D. This improves performance and fault tolerance. Serverless automatically adjusts capacity for performance.

questions.text: Which of the below are responsibilities of the customer when using Amazon EC2? (Choose TWO)

options.text: B. Patching of the underlying infrastructure.
C. Setup and operation of managed databases.
E. Installing and configuring third-party software.

questions.explanation: Correct answer: A, E. Customers must encrypt and control access to their data. Customers manage applications on EC2 instances.

questions.text: Why would an organization decide to use AWS over an on-premises data center? (Choose TWO)
questions.explanation: Correct answer: C, E. AWS scales resources to match demand. Pay-as-you-go pricing eliminates upfront hardware investment.

questions.text: Which of the following AWS services can help you perform security analysis and regulatory compliance auditing? (Choose TWO)
questions.explanation: Correct answer: A, E. It assesses security vulnerabilities in AWS resources. It audits configuration changes and compliance over time.

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT a characteristic of Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2)?

options.text: A. Amazon EC2 is considered a Serverless Web Service.
B. Amazon EC2 eliminates the need to invest in hardware upfront.
C. Amazon EC2 can launch as many or as few virtual servers as needed.
D. Amazon EC2 offers scalable computing.

questions.explanation: Correct answer: A. EC2 is not serverless; it requires instance management.

questions.text: What is the AWS Compute service that executes code only when triggered by events?
questions.explanation: Correct answer: A. Lambda runs code in response to triggers without provisioning servers.

questions.text: Both AWS and traditional IT distributors provide a wide range of virtual servers to meet their customers’ requirements. What is the name of these virtual servers in AWS?
questions.explanation: Correct answer: D. They are scalable virtual servers hosted in the cloud.

questions.text: What is the framework created by AWS Professional Services that helps organizations design a road map to successful cloud adoption?
questions.explanation: Correct answer: C. The Cloud Adoption Framework helps plan cloud migrations.

questions.text: TYMO Cloud Corp is looking forward to migrating their entire on-premises data center to AWS. What tool can they use to perform a cost-benefit analysis of moving to the AWS Cloud?
questions.explanation: Correct answer: B. It compares on-premises vs. cloud costs to evaluate savings.

questions.text: Which of the following activities supports the Operational Excellence pillar of the AWS Well-Architected Framework?

options.text: A. Using AWS Trusted Advisor to find underutilized resources.
B. Using AWS CloudTrail to record user activities.
C. Using AWS CloudFormation to manage infrastructure as code.
D. Deploying an application in multiple Availability Zones.

questions.explanation: Correct answer: C. This supports automation and repeatability.

questions.text: Why do many startup companies prefer AWS over traditional on-premises solutions? (Choose TWO)

options.text: A. AWS allows them to pay later when their business succeed.
B. AWS can build complete data centers faster than any other Cloud provider.
C. Using AWS, they can reduce time-to-market by focusing on business activities rather than on building and managing data centers.
D. AWS removes the need to invest in operational expenditure.
E. Using AWS allows companies to replace large capital expenditure with low variable costs.

questions.explanation: Correct answer: C, E. This helps startups innovate faster. Pay-as-you-go removes upfront spending.

questions.text: What are the benefits of using DynamoDB? (Choose TWO)

options.text: A. Automatically scales to meet required throughput capacity.
B. Provides resizable instances to match the current demand.
C. Supports both relational and non-relational data models.
D. Offers extremely low (single-digit millisecond) latency.
E. Supports the most popular NoSQL database engines such as CouchDB and MongoDB.

questions.explanation: Correct answer: A, D. DynamoDB adjusts to traffic without manual intervention. It supports fast, consistent response times.

questions.text: Which of the following can be used to protect data at rest on Amazon S3? (Choose TWO)
questions.explanation: Correct answer: A, C. It retains all versions of an object, aiding data recovery. Bucket policies and ACLs control access to S3 data.

questions.text: As part of the AWS Migration Acceleration Program (MAP), what does AWS provide to accelerate Enterprise adoption of AWS? (Choose TWO)
questions.explanation: Correct answer: A, C. Partners bring migration expertise and tools. They offer consulting for enterprise migration success.

questions.text: AWS recommends some practices to help organizations avoid unexpected charges on their bill. Which of the following is NOT one of these practices?

options.text: A. Deleting unused EBS volumes after terminating an EC2instance.
B. Deleting unused AutoScaling launch configuration.
C. Deleting unused Elastic Load Balancers.
D. Releasing unused Elastic IPs after terminating an EC2instance.

questions.explanation: Correct answer: B. Launch configurations incur no charges and don't need deletion.

questions.text: What is the AWS tool that can help a company visualize their AWS spending in the last few months?
questions.explanation: Correct answer: A. It provides graphs of historical AWS spending data.

questions.text: When running a workload in AWS, the customer is NOT responsible for: (Select TWO)
questions.explanation: Correct answer: C, E. AWS handles the physical security and maintenance. AWS secures the cloud infrastructure itself.

questions.text: Which AWS service can be used to send promotional text messages (SMS) to more than 200 countries worldwide?

options.text: A. Amazon Simple Email Service (Amazon SES).
B. Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3).
C. Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS).
D. Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS).

questions.explanation: Correct answer: C. SNS can send SMS messages globally to subscribers.

questions.text: Which of the following allows you to create new RDS instances? (Choose TWO)
questions.explanation: Correct answer: C, E. It can automate creation of RDS resources via templates. It provides a graphical interface to launch and manage RDS.

questions.text: One of the major advantages of using AWS is cost savings. What does AWS provide to reduce the cost of running Amazon EC2 instances?

options.text: A. Low monthly instance maintenance costs.

questions.explanation: Correct answer: C. EC2 billing is precise to the second, reducing cost.

questions.text: Which AWS Group assists customers in achieving their desired business outcomes?
questions.explanation: Correct answer: B. They guide customers to meet business goals through AWS.

questions.text: Which AWS service or feature is used to manage the keys used to encrypt customer data?
questions.explanation: Correct answer: A. It manages and protects encryption keys for AWS services.

questions.text: Which AWS Service allows customers to download AWS SOC & PCI reports?
questions.explanation: Correct answer: B. Artifact gives access to compliance documents and audit reports.
